scripts.say: Wow, it's Cleveland and Helena!
I was lured here by this sweet aroma, I didn't expect to meet you girls here.
This sweet aroma... what's this? Some kind of scented wine?
It's my secret osmanthus wine~ But I didn't expect you all to be attracted by the scent. Did I not seal it properly?

No... Cleveland sniffed the scent of the faint aroma, then pestered me to use my SG radar to track its location. Even if there are others who picked up on the smell, they should not be able to locate the source.
Here is someone who found the source of the aroma before you ---

Just so happens that fate has brought you two here, it's getting late now so if you both don't mind, how about staying for dinner. Today we're celebrating a festival from my country --- the Mid-Autumn Festival.
Today was suppose to be my turn to cook, right….OK! Let's stay! I've gotten off easy!

If you don't cook today, you'll still cook tomorrow. I've admired the cuisine from the Dragon Empery for a long time now. Yat Sen, will you be able to open my eyes and shatter my expectations tonight?
Of course. The highlight of tonight's meal are “mooncakes”, which symbolizes harmony and reunion. We haven't finished making them yet, do you want to see the process of how they're being made?
Thank you, don't mind if I do
Ping Hai and Ning Hai, please take out the ingredients---
Sis, let's make them together! Let's see who can make them better!
I feel like you're very excited today... fine, I'll show everyone here the strength of “Lady Lex”!
Ah! This looks very interesting, Helena, let's join them?
This way, I can consider this as cooking! So for tomorrow---
Don't be so lazy…...
Yeah! I'm done at last - yay, was I the slowest? With help from others, I thought could've at least finished in the middle...
You spent so much time kneading the dough
So, the mooncakes have started baking, let's take a short break before we start our Mid-Autumn Festival dinner.
In addition, before we start dinner, please allow me to express my gratitude for everyone's attendance!
No worries~ it's more like my sister has been causing so much mischief for you all.
No I haven't!
It's an honor to be able to eat food hand-made by Yan Set and Ning Hai.
Haha! I didn't do anything, although --- the liveliness is what counts for making it a festival!
That's true...festivals are all about the rowdy atmosphere!
